title: Spiral Diner and Bakery - Fort Worth
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, International, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery
description: Vegan diner and bakery operating since 2002. Features vegan food with items such as sketti n' meatballs and Spiral veggieburger in addition to fresh juices, smoothies, sundaes, and pies. All-you-can-eat pancake meal on Sunday. Sells a few vegan products and refrigerated foods. Uses mostly organic ingredients and practices green ethics by recycling and using biodegradable takeaway containers.
